points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.analysis: "We collect information about you and your use of our service, [...]This information includes: [...] referring source (for example, referral URLs),"

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: le suivi via des cookies de tiers à d'autres fins sans votre consentement.
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.analysis: "We collect information about you and your use of our service,[...] This information includes: [...] IP address (which may tell us your general location),"

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP, qui peut être utilisée pour déterminer votre emplacement approximatif.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Ce service nécessite des cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

points.title: Terms and privacy policy pages are organized and formatted well.
points.analysis: Index at the top with links to #anchors down the page. The pages are long, but the index helps alleviate that a lot.

case.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
case.localized_title: Les pages relatives aux conditions d'utilisation et à la politique de confidentialité sont bien organisées et formatées.
case.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

points.title: Users can request access and deletion of personal info.
points.analysis: With respect to your personal information, you can request access and that we correct or delete this personal information by emailing your request to pri...@netflix.com.

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs peuvent demander l'accès à leurs données personnelles et leur suppression.
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: The service has a no refund policy

case.title: The service has a no refund policy
case.localized_title: Le service est soumis à une politique de non-remboursement
case.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.

points.title: Your biometric data is collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques sont collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.analysis: You may cancel your Netflix membership at any time. WE DO NOT PROVIDE REFUNDS OR CREDITS FOR ANY PARTIAL-MONTH MEMBERSHIP PERIODS OR UNWATCHED MOVIES OR TV SHOWS.

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

case.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: De nombreux tiers sont impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil pour les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Le "spidering" ou "crawling" n'est pas autorisé.

points.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles pour utiliser la publicité ciblée de tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il entend utiliser vos données à caractère personnel
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

case.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
case.localized_title: Le service ne répondra qu'aux demandes raisonnables du gouvernement
case.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location Netherlands

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.localized_title: La juridiction compétente est celle des Pays-Bas.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il collecte les données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Ce service vous permet de récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service peut communiquer vos informations personnelles à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

case.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
case.localized_title: L'application requise pour ce service nécessite des autorisations étendues de l'appareil.
case.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
points.analysis: Full quote: "Information you provide to us: We collect information you provide to us which includes: your name, email address, address or postal code, payment method(s), and telephone number. In certain countries, we collect a government identification number for purposes such as billing and tax compliance. We collect this information in a number of ways, including when you enter it while using our service, interact with our customer service, or participate in surveys or marketing promotions."

case.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
case.localized_title: Le service peut collecter des données supplémentaires vous concernant par le biais de promotions
case.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.

points.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Le service propose un mécanisme de réclamation pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: The service provides a free help desk

case.title: A free help desk is provided
case.localized_title: Le service propose un service d'assistance gratuit
case.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

points.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Le service utilise des cookies/pixels de médias sociaux
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Ce service peut conserver des données à caractère personnel après une demande d'effacement pour des raisons d'intérêt commercial ou d'obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne.

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

case.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
case.localized_title: Vous autorisez le service à débiter une carte de crédit fournie sur une base récurrente.
case.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser la publicité ciblée
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

case.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
case.localized_title: Vous devez indiquer votre nom légal, les pseudonymes ne sont pas autorisés.
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: This service tracks you on social media and public databases.
points.analysis: "These sources vary over time, but could include: [...] publicly-available sources such as publicly available posts on social media platforms and information available through public databases associating IP addresses with internet service providers (ISPs)."

case.title: This service tracks you on other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous suit sur les médias sociaux et dans les bases de données publiques.
case.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

case.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
case.localized_title: Lorsque le service souhaite apporter une modification substantielle à ses conditions, les utilisateurs en sont informés au moins 30 jours à l'avance.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

points.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service

case.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
case.localized_title: Les mineurs doivent avoir l'autorisation de leur tuteur légal pour utiliser le service.
case.description: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the services. The legal guardians are responsible for the use of the service by the minor.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years old

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service est réservé aux utilisateurs âgés de plus de 18 ans.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes

case.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise vos informations personnelles à différentes fins
case.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.

points.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
points.analysis: Your information can be transferred to a new company, but only if it complies with Netflix's Privacy Policy.

case.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
case.localized_title: Les promesses seront tenues après une fusion ou une acquisition
case.description: If the service gets acquired or needs to transfer personal data after a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale of the services, the data will still be processed in a manner that honours the promises made in the agreements.

points.title: Netflix reserve the right to disclose personal info, no notification.
points.analysis: Netflix also reserves the right to disclose personal information if we reasonably believe that access, use, preservation or disclosure of such information is reasonably necessary to (a) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process, or enforceable governmental request, (b) enforce applicable terms of use, including investigation of potential violations thereof, (c) detect, prevent, or otherwise address illegal or suspected illegal activities, security or technical issues, or (d) protect against harm to the rights, property or safety of Netflix, its users or the public as required or permitted by law. In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transferring of assets we reserve the right to transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our privacy policy.

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Netflix se réserve le droit de divulguer des informations personnelles, sans notification.
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.analysis:
"[...]Information you provide to us: We collect information you provide to us which includes: your name, email address, address or postal code, payment method(s), and telephone number.[...]
information when you choose to provide ratings, taste preferences, account settings (including preferences set in the "Account" section of our website), or otherwise provide information to us through our service or elsewhere.
Information we collect automatically[...]"

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: Le service recueille différents types de données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
points.analysis: Full quote: "Information you provide to us: We collect information you provide to us which includes: your name, email address, address or postal code, payment method(s), and telephone number. In certain countries, we collect a government identification number for purposes such as billing and tax compliance. We collect this information in a number of ways, including when you enter it while using our service, interact with our customer service, or participate in surveys or marketing promotions."

case.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
case.localized_title: Les pixels de suivi sont utilisés dans la communication entre les services et les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

points.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

case.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez limiter la façon dont vos informations sont utilisées par des tiers et par le service
case.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
